item.title: Auditing the Algorithm: Building a Responsible AI Pipeline That Scales
item.description: When regulators asked for evidence that our AI systems behave responsibly, we realized spreadsheets and ad hoc reviews wouldn’t suffice. Our models influenced credit decisions, hiring suggestions, and medical triage. Stakeholders demanded more than accuracyâ€”they wanted fairness, explainability, and accountability. We responded by building a responsible AI audit pipeline woven into development, deployment, and operations. This article shares how we did it: the processes, tooling, and cultural shifts that turned compliance into continuous curiosity.
